texts.title: Boogie wonderland
texts.content: LEÜTÉS INTRO R Dance, Boogie Wonderland, hey, hey Dance, Boogie Wonderland 1. Midnight creeps so slowly into hearts of men Who need more than they get Daylight deals a bad hand to a woman Who has laid too many bets 2. The mirror stares you in the face and says "Baby, uh, uh, it don't work" You say your prayers though you don't care You dance and shake the hat R Dance, Boogie Wonderland, hey, hey Dance, Boogie Wonderland 3.Sound fly through the night I chase my vinyl dreams to Boogie Wonderland I find romance when I start to dance in Boogie Wonderland I find romance when I start to dance in Boogie Wonderland R Dance, Boogie Wonderland, hey, hey Dance, Boogie Wonderland TÜTÜTŰRŰ X8 KLAVIR SOLO BOSSA REFREN

texts.title: Hot stuff
texts.content: INTRO GITARA SOLO GITARA 1. Sittin' here eatin' my heart out waitin' Waitin' for some lover to call Dialed about a thousand numbers lately Almost rang the phone off the wall R Lookin' for some hot stuff, baby, this evenin' I need some hot stuff, baby, tonight I want some hot stuff, baby, this evenin' Gotta have some hot stuff Gotta have some love tonight B HAHAHA STUFF HAHAHA HAHAHA STUFF HAHAHA SOLO GITARA 2. Lookin' for a lover who needs another Don't want another night on my own Wanna share my love with a warm blooded lover Wanna bring a wild man back home B HAHAHA STUFF HAHAHA HAHAHA STUFF HAHAHA SOLO GITARA R Gotta have some hot love, baby, this evenin' I need some hot stuff, baby, tonight I want some hot stuff, baby, this evenin' Got to have some lovin' Got to have love tonight B HAHAHA STUFF HAHAHA HAHAHA STUFF HAHAHA

texts.title: Let's groove
texts.content: INTRO 1. Let's groove tonight Share the spice of life Baby, slice it right We're gonna groove tonight R Let this groove get you to move It's alright, alright, alright Let this groove set in your shoes So stand up, alright, alright 2. Gonna tell you what you can do with my love Alright Let you know, girl You're looking good, you're out of sight Alright Just move yourself and glide like a 747 And lose yourself in the sky Among the clouds in the heavens, gods R Let this groove get you to move It's alright, alright, alright Let this groove set in your shoes So stand up, alright, alright B

texts.title: Lóvé generation
texts.content: INTRO INTRO re mi mi fa re mi mi fa do mi mi fa re mi mi fa STROFA Why must the children play in the streets Broken hearts and faded dreams Peace on earth to everyone that you meet Don't you worry, it could be so sweet Just look to the rainbow, you will see The sun will shine 'til eternity I've got so much love in my heart No one can tear it apart, yeah R Be the love generation Yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah Be the love generation C'mon, c'mon, c'mon, c'mon – eh! Be the love generation Oh, yeah-ah! Be the love generation (Eh!) SOLO ZVIŽDUK SOLO ZVIŽDUK R Be the love generation Yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah Be the love generation C'mon, c'mon, c'mon, c'mon – eh! Be the love generation Oh, yeah-ah! Be the love generation (Eh!) STROFA Everything is gonna be allright x16 R Be the love generation Yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah Be the love generation C'mon, c'mon, c'mon, c'mon – eh! Be the love generation Oh, yeah-ah! Be the love generation (Eh!) SOLO ZVIŽDUK SOLO ZVIŽDUK SOLO ZVIŽDUK

texts.title: On the radio
texts.content: 1. Someone found a letter you wrote me on the radio And they told the world just how you felt It must have fallen out of a hole in your old brown overcoat They never said your name, but I knew just who they meant 2. Whoa-oh-oh-oh I was so surprised and shocked, and I wondered, too If, by chance, you heard it for yourself I never told a soul just how I've been feeling over you But they said it really loud, they said it on the air REFREN On the radio, whoa-oh-oh-oh On the radio, whoa-oh-oh-oh On the radio, whoa-oh-oh-oh On the radio, whoa-oh-oh-oh 3. Now, now, don't it kinda strike you sad when you hear our song? Things are not the same since we broke up last June The only thing that I wanna hear is that you love me still And that you think you'll be comin' home real soon 4. Whoa-oh-oh-oh Yeah, it kinda made me feel proud when I heard him say You couldn't find the words to say it yourself And now in my heart, I know I can say what I really feel 'Cause they said it really loud, they said it on the air REFREN On the radio, whoa-oh-oh-oh On the radio, whoa-oh-oh-oh On the radio, whoa-oh-oh-oh On the radio, whoa-oh-oh-oh On the radio SOLO 5. If you think that love isn't found on the radio Then tune right in, you may find the love you lost 'Cause now I'm sitting here with the man I sent away long ago It sounded really loud, he said it really loud REFREN On the radio, whoa-oh-oh-oh On the radio, whoa-oh-oh-oh On the radio, whoa-oh-oh-oh On the radio, whoa-oh-oh-oh On the radio

texts.title: September
texts.content: INTRO 10 1. Do you remember The 21st night of September? Love was changin' the minds of pretenders While chasin' the clouds away 2. Our hearts were ringin' In the key that our souls were singin' As we danced in the night, remember How the stars stole the night away, oh, yeah Hey, hey, hey R Ba-dee-ya, say, do you remember? Ba-dee-ya, dancin' in September Ba-dee-ya, never was a cloudy day B Ba-du-da, ba-du-da, ba-du-da, ba-du Ba-du-da, ba-du, ba-du-da, ba-du Ba-du-da, ba-du, ba-du-da 3. My thoughts are with you Holdin' hands with your heart to see you Only blue talk and love, remember How we knew love was here to stay 4. Now December Found the love that we shared in September Only blue talk and love, remember The true love we share today Hey, hey, hey R Ba-dee-ya, say, do you remember? Ba-dee-ya, dancin' in September Ba-dee-ya, never was a cloudy day There was a B Ba-du-da, ba-du-da, ba-du-da, ba-du Ba-du-da, ba-du, ba-du-da, ba-du Ba-du-da, ba-du, ba-du-da
